title: MAGCOMSEN Men's Flannel Shirts Cotton Long Sleeve Plaid Shirt Casual Fashion Button Up Shirts Jackets with 2 Pockets
description: Made of pure cotton fabric, lightweight, soft, breathable and comfortable.
Warm: The plaid shirts made of high-quality flannel fabric, will keep you warm and relaxed.
Stylish Classic: The button down shirt features plaid design that adds a classic and pop of color; Easy pairing with a range of t shirt tops or casual apparel.

Occasions: This flannel plaid shirt is perfect for daily wear, outdoor casual, working, shopping, street fashion; Suitable for fall, spring, winter and other season; The long sleeve button down shirt is wardrobe essential.
